title: missing specialization: `<serialize::json::Encoder as SpecializedEncoder<syntax_pos::symbol::Ident>>::specialized_encode` not overridden

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
The following code when compiled with `-Z ast-json` causes ICE:
```rust
pub fn main() {
    let a = ["1", "lol", "3", "NaN", "5"];

    let element: Option<i32> = a.iter().filter_map(|s| s.parse().ok()).next();
    assert_eq!(element, Some(1));
}
```

Error:
```rust
% RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo rustc -- -Z ast-json
   Compiling check v0.1.0 (/home/lzutao/forked/rust/check)
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'missing specialization: `<serialize::json::Encoder as SpecializedEncoder<syntax_pos::symbol::Ident>>::specialized_encode` not overridden', src/libserialize/serialize.rs:851:9
```
